::FZ::

FZ nods. "Agreed. But I must get back to my base."

He nods slightly as he hears Dark One.

"There are some bots nearby," he says to Vehement, "We will attack 
them on our way back, since they are our enemies. This planet is 
dangerous though, always be on alert."

He turns around, motioning to Dark One. "Lets go, we'll attack the 
bots on our way back."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Dark One/Hiss/Vehement:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> "Yes, a ceasefire.  If our troops encounter each other, my troops 
will back 
> off.  But we will not aid you in fights, and do not expect the 
same."
> 
> ---
> 
> Hiss walked up to Dark One, covering both sides of his mouth and 
almost 
> silently whispered into Dark One's mouth.
> 
> ---
> 
> Dark One walked over to Zardus.  "Enemies behind us.  Not many, 
they're just 
> sitting their." the Oblitercon leader whispered into Zardus' audio 
receptors.
